description: Mr Michael Chen became a taxi driver so he could ferry his children around for their sports practice sessions. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Dad-icated fathers: Taxi driver raised five national athletes, with one heading for the Olympics
title_page: Dad-icated fathers: Taxi driver raised five national athletes, with one heading for the Olympics | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Step into Mr Michael Chen’s flat in Jurong and the first thing that catches your eye is a large basket full of medals on the coffee table.
They are just some of the many sporting accolades his six children have amassed over the years, says the 70-year-old proudly, sweeping his arm to show off the trophies on display in the cabinets he built by hand.
